about.

Hi, my name is Oktay. I'm 25 years old from London, Uk.
I am junior front-end developer-designer
who has being passionate to improve my skills,
learning different language and wants to gain more experience.
I really enjoy writing optimised object oriented code
and good at developed web-based applications from design to coding and
implementation under the direction of the Senior Developer.
